about_the_game:
The war. Light versus darkness. It has been going on for thousands of years. One night, the Thousand-Year War suddenly knocked on your window. You will have to meet an uninvited guest.

You have 2 weapons - sound and mindfulness. You need to respond in a timely manner to every sound that will surround you and try to find or eliminate the source that makes it because every second lost can cost you your life.

List of supported languages:
  • English
  • Русский
  • Українська
  • Qazaq
  • Deutsche
  • Français
  • Español
  • Italiano
  • 简体中文
  • 日本語
  • हिन्दी
detailed_description:
The war. Light versus darkness. It has been going on for thousands of years. One night, the Thousand-Year War suddenly knocked on your window. You will have to meet an uninvited guest.

You have 2 weapons - sound and mindfulness. You need to respond in a timely manner to every sound that will surround you and try to find or eliminate the source that makes it because every second lost can cost you your life.

name: Leenie Boog Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8.1 / 10 - x64
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-4440
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 ti 2 gb / AMD Radeon hd 7790 2gb
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8.1 / 10 - x64
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-4460
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 ti 4gb / AMD Radeon R9 285 2gb
  • Storage: 2 MB available space

short_description: The war. Light versus darkness. It has been going on for thousands of years. One night, the Thousand-Year War suddenly knocked on your window. You will have to meet an uninvited guest.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Ukrainian, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil
